component.notes:
Aux1 is the Hidro 1 Aux2 is the Hidro 2 SpaModeOn is AutomaticFill SpaModeOff is MasterOff
The wiring diagram for the SPA is:
Savant SPA Tx+ No Connection Tx- -------------------- - Rx+ -------------------- + Rx- ------\ Jumped GND ------/
